Marketing for Tourism & Hospitality

The aim of this unit is introduce students to key concepts and principles relating to contemporary marketing as they apply to the tourism and hospitality industries. In particular it introduces students to aspects of marketing which are unique to the tourism/hospitality sector, such as destination marketing.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Understand the nature, scope and importance of contemporary marketing within the tourism and hospitality industries.

+  Understand key concepts and principles of marketing in the context of the tourism and hospitality industries, taking into consideration the internal and external environment.

+  Understand the principles of segmentation, targeting and positioning (STP) in the context of tourism and hospitality services.

+  Understanding of the key principles and practices of marketing places and destinations.

+  Demonstrate an understanding of the constituent parts and purpose of a marketing plan.
